snippet: Rahm Emanuel wants to raise property taxes and require some city workers and retirees to contribute more for their retirement benefits to repair a pension system at risk of insolvency.
abstract: Chicago Mayor Rahm Emanuel's administration has begun an urgent push to require some city workers to pay more for their retirement benefits and to raise property taxes; moves are intended to address one of the most poorly funded pension systems among the nation's major cities.
lead_paragraph: Rahm Emanuel wants to raise property taxes and require some city workers and retirees to contribute more for their retirement benefits to repair a pension system at risk of insolvency.

headline.main: Chicago Mayor Seeks Alterations to Repair Badly Underfunded Pension Plan
headline.print_headline: Chicago Mayor Seeks Alterations to Repair Badly Underfunded Pension Plan
